Title: The Next Step
Writer: Adam Kramer (story), Jack McQuistin (story), Jack McQuistin
Actors: Andrew Baker, Jordan Benson, Morgan Taylor Campbell, Breann Grainger
Plot: 'The Next Step' is the story of the quiet and self-conscious Richard Floyd, along with his three friends Will, Myles, and Stew. Upon entering their last year of high school, and knowing ...
